title: Report: Stadia deprioritized as white-label ‘Google Stream’ aims for Bungie, Capcom deals
content:
Stadia’s future as a white-label streaming platform has been clear for some months now, especially after the first partnership with AT&T. A new report provides more details into the current state of Stadia and the new “Google Stream” focus.

more…

The post Report: Stadia deprioritized as white-label ‘Google Stream’ aims for Bungie, Capcom deals appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A new report provides more details into the current state of Stadia, including its future as the "Google Stream" white-label platform...
